generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and traffic signs, indicating it is a road for vehicles.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the left side of the image, adjacent to the road, with a curb separating it.
- building: A large building with classical architecture is visible in the background on the left side of the image.
- vegetation: There are numerous trees and greenery along the sides of the road and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing clear and blue.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the image.
- rider: Two riders on motorcycles are visible in the middle of the road, moving away from the camera.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including one directly ahead and others in the distance.
- motorcycle: Two motorcycles are visible in the middle of the road, with riders on them.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible throughout the image, including those holding traffic signs and lights.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a blue circular sign with a white arrow, a red circle with a white bar, and a red and white striped sign.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection in the distance.
- wall: A low wall or barrier is visible on the right side of the image, separating the road from the vegetation.
- fence: A fence is visible on the right side of the image, running parallel to the road.
- terrain: Some grassy areas are visible on the right side of the image, behind the fence.
- truck: A white truck is visible in the distance on the left side of the image.
